name: Flaked!
description:
Note: Some players have reported stuttering while playing in the browser. If this happens, please try the downloadable version.

Experience the thrill of being a frog that needs to assemble a band on the night of your big performance because the rest of your band Flaked!

Created for the Narrative Driven Jam #7: https://itch.io/jam/narrative-driven-jam-7

Developed By

Stand of Giants Games (@StandOfGiants)

Developer

zipcodeman (https://zmbush.itch.io)

Character Artist

Kirisali (@_kirisali)

Character Writer

hamstercheese7 (@buggyisbest)

Music

zipcodeman (@z_inabush)

Models

Prop Instrument Drum Kit Ultra Low Poly - sketchfab.com/Maxime66410

Low Poly Piano/Keyboard - sketchfab.com/dpalme

Low Poly Beer Bottle - sketchfab.com/kenny_pizza

Wooden Stool Low-poly - sketchfab.com/MaX3Dd
